org.altbeacon.beacon.logging

Class Loggers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.altbeacon.beacon.logging.Loggers

  • public final class Loggers
extends java.lang.Object
    Static factory methods for getting different Logger implementations.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Detail

      • empty

        public static Logger empty()
        Returns:
        Get a logger that does nothing.

      • verboseLogger

        public static Logger verboseLogger()
        Returns:
        Get a logger that logs all messages to default Android logs.
        See Also:
        android.util.Log

      • warningLogger

        public static Logger warningLogger()
        Returns:
        Get a logger that logs messages of warning and greater.
        See Also:
        android.util.Log
